{{convert|13.5|kn|lk=in}} surfaced<br/>{{convert|16|kn|lk=in}} submerged |Ship range= {{convert|4000|nmi|abbr=on|lk=in}} at {{convert|8.5|kn|abbr=on}} |Ship endurance= |Ship test depth= |Ship complement=33 (7 officers, 26 men) |Ship time to activate= |Ship sensors= |Ship EW= |Ship armament=• 4 × {{convert|533|mm|in|0|abbr=on}} [[torpedo tube]]s<br/>• 8 × torpedoes |Ship armour= |Ship notes= }} |} The '''''Delfinen'' class submarines''' were the last class of submarines of the [[Royal Danish Navy]] designed and built entirely by Danish architects. The first three boats of the class were financed by [[Denmark]]. The fourth was financed by the [[United States]] (where it was known as SS-554) under the [[Cost Share]] program. ==Ships== * {{Ship|HDMS|Delfinen|S326|2}}, launched 4 May 1956, commissioned 1 August 1961, decommissioned 2 August 1983, sold for scrapping 11 September 1984.<ref>{{Cite web |url= http://www.navalhistory.dk/english/theships/D/Delfinen(1961).htm |title=''Delfinen'' (1961-1983) |work=navalhistory.dk |accessdate=19 July 2010 }}</ref> * {{Ship|HDMS|Spækhuggeren|S327|2}}, launched 20 February 1957, commissioned 1 August 1961, decommissioned 31 July 1989, sold for scrapping, 3 December 1991.<ref>{{Cite web |url= http://www.navalhistory.dk/english/theships/S/Spaekhuggeren(1959).htm |title=''Spækhuggeren'' (1959-1989) |work=navalhistory.dk |accessdate=19 July 2010 }}</ref> * {{Ship|HDMS|Tumleren|S328|2}}, launched 22 May 1958, commissioned 1 August 1961, decommissioned 6 August 1981, sold for scrapping 7 September 1982.<ref>{{Cite web |url= http://www.navalhistory.dk/english/theships/T/Tumleren(1961).htm |title=''Tumleren'' (1961-1981) |work=navalhistory.dk |accessdate=19 July 2010 }}</ref> * {{Ship|HDMS|Springeren|S329|2}}, launched 22 April 1963, commissioned 22 October 1964, decommissioned 31 March 1990 and handed over to the Naval Museum in Aalborg.<ref>{{Cite web |url= http://www.navalhistory.dk/english/theships/S/Springeren(1964).htm |title=''Springeren'' (1964-1990) |work=navalhistory.dk |accessdate=19 July 2010 }}</ref> ==See also== {{Commonscat-inline|Delfinen class submarine}} ==References== ;Notes {{Reflist}} ;Bibliography * "Flådens skibe og fartøjer" 1945-1995, by Gunnar Olsen and Svenn Storgaard, ''Marinehistoriske skrifter'', Copenhagen 1998 (ISBN 87-87720-13-2) * ''U-både gennem 75 år - Det danske ubådsvåben 1909-84'', by Hans Chr. Bjerg, Hans Chr. Dahlerup Koch and P. B. Nielsen, Forlaget Forum, 1984 [[Category:Submarine classes]] [[Category:Delfinen-class submarines| ]] [[Category:1950s ships]]
